keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Reveals Capture of Ace
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard reveals to Luffy that the Blackbeard Pirates captured Portgas D. Ace to secure a Warlord position.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's role in triggering the events leading to the Marineford War.

keyMoments.title: Hints at Hidden Plan in Impel Down
keyMoments.description: The crew is revealed to have infiltrated Impel Down as part of a larger strategic plan.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the crew's recruitment of Level 6 prisoners.

keyMoments.title: Entire Crew Poisoned by Magellan
keyMoments.description: Magellan catches up to the Blackbeard Pirates and poisons the entire crew with his Doku Doku no Mi abilities, leaving them incapacitated.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even a Warlord crew can be overwhelmed by Impel Down's chief warden.

goals: Recruit powerful Level 6 prisoners from Impel Down
Pursue the title of Pirate King
